column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Yesterday , I got ready to take a bath because I had a long stressful day .
#text=I started running the water and made sure it was just the right temperature .
#text=I did n't want the tub too hot or too cold .
#text=After getting the bath tub to the required temperature .
#text=I put some bubbles in it to make it extra fun !
#text=I hopped in the bath tub and soaked in it for quite some time while reading a nice book .
#text=It was a great relief to a very long day .
#text=I love taking baths at the end of the day to unwind .
#text=After a twenty minutes , or so , it was time to hop out and get dried off .
#text=I grabbed my towel that was just recently washed , and dried myself off .
#text=I felt a great deal of relief being nice and clean and ready to go for the rest of the night !
